dry-needling-cupping: A clinical education photo, exactly two people: The therapist is DRMAKS (male, long dark brown hair, beard, wearing a navy Physica Medica t-shirt). Close-up waist-up framing, clear view of hands and needle, private treatment room, no other people, fully clothed, realistic anatomy, realistic hands.
